data.title: Apartment Rental Properties around NY
data.meta_description: Apartment Rental Properties around NYC both Luxury Apartments and Affordable Apartments for rent at ccmanagers.com. Search no fee rental apartments today.
data.text:
This newly constructed smoke free building offers many amenities including, on-site laundry room, landscaped courtyard, and community room. Individuals or households who meet the income and household size requirements listed in the advertisement on our website may apply. Income limits range from 30% to 80% of Area Median Income (AMI). Qualified applicants will be required […]

Amenity-rich lifestyle in Newark offering modern appointments and unrivaled convenience. Luxury Apartments for rent in Newark. Studio, 1, 2 & 3 bedroom homes available.

Georgia King Village is located near several highways such as the I-280, and I-78. NJ Transit buses 21,34,73, and 99, are located on West Market Street, which is in immediate proximity of GKV. Sporting and social attractions such as the Prudential Center, Newark Symphony Hall, NJ Performing Arts Center, Newark Museum, numerous restaurants & shopping, […]

Mixed-income & mixed-use development with beautiful units available. The building has been restored and listed on the National Register of Historic Places.

Steps from the peaceful Rockaway beach and the A train, Arverne View underwent major renovations consisting of new community space and Energy Star appliances in each unit. Additional amenities include modern laundry, 24-hr security, commercial shopping and on-site day care. On-site Day Care and Education Center. Community Room. 24-hour Security. MINIMUM INCOME STUDIOS 1 TO […]

Also know as 225 E 7th St. This East Village No-Fee rental building has great amenities and is surrounded by great restaurants, transportation and shopping.

1789 Amsterdam Avenue is a no fee rental building located in the Hamilton Heights neighborhood of upper Manhattan. This is an income restricted property.

9 Cook Street is Accepting Applications to fill vacancy & replenish Waitlist. Minimum income $31,098 for household of 1 Only.

121 E 131st Street is an affordable no fee rental building located in the Central Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan.

35 Brevoort Place located in Bedford-Syuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn and is a no-fee rental building with 5 apartments.

This 5 story, no-fee rental building is in a fantastic location surrounded by everything you need!

This no-fee rental building is located on a tree-lined street in the Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan.

210 W 146th St located in Harlem, is a no fee, 6 story rental building with 19 apartments.

This no -fee rental building located in the Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan was renovated in 1992.

This No-Fee residential property is a 5-story building just minutes away from the 1, A, B, C, and D subway trains.

450 E 148th Street is located in the Mott Haven Section of the Bronx

620 St Nicholas Avenue is located in the Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan. It has 10 no-fee rental apartments on 5 floors.

351 W 141st St is located in the Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan It is a 6-story, walk-up building with 12 no-fee apartments. It is surrounded by all the necessities.

180 Edgecombe Avenue is an elevator building that has 42 no-fee apartments and is located between 142nd and 143rd Streets in Manhattan.

169 Edgecombe Avenue is located in Manhattan. It is a 5-story building located very close by the A,B,C and D trains at the 145 Street subway station.

Located btwn 141st and 145th Street in the Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan, this no -fee rental building is close by all the necessities.

Is a five story, no-fee rental building in Manhattan.This elevator building is located in the Hamilton Heights neighborhood and is in close proximity to all your daily necessities.

Is a no-Fee, walk-up rental building in the Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan. It has 10 apartments and is a five story building.

457 W 125th Street is a no-rental fee building located in the Manhattanville area of Harlem that was renovated in 2005. It is surrounded by banks, post office, restaurants, public schools and Houses of Worship. The building sits near the A,B,C, and D subway at 125th st station.

464 W 126th Street is located in the Manhattanville neighborhood of Manhattan. Nearby catch the 1, A,B,C, and D trains at 125th Street station.

2922 Frederick Douglas Blvd (8th Avenue) is in Harlem and is located nearby groceries, the post office, parks, deli, restaurants and more.

A 36 unit, no-fee, low-rise rental building, standing 6-stories tall and is located nearby the A, B,C, D and 1 Trains at the 145 St subway station.

Located on 8th Ave/Frederick Douglass Blvd in Harlem, this low-rise building is near by public transportation and just two blocks from the Jackie Robinson Park.

This mid-rise building is in the Melrose section of the Bronx and is located near the #2 and #5 subway trains.

Located between Lexington Avenue and 3rd Avenue, this 6-story building has 12-units and is surrounded by everything you need.

Everything you need is right here in the neighborhood. Located in Harlem, there are restaurants, shopping, shoe repair, groceries and more.

Renovated in 1991, this no-fee, pre-war, 6-story apartment building has a total of 75 apartments and is located in the area known as the South Bronx.

This walk-up, low-rise no-fee building was built in 2009. The B7 bus route is just around the corner.

275 E 94th has two nearby Subway stations; Saratoga Ave and Sutter Av / Rutland Rd where you can pick up the 3 train.

269 E Burnside Ave located in the Fordam section of the Bronx, is a brand residential building that was built in 2010.

406 E. 161st Street is a mid-rise, 9 story building with 88 apartments. It is located in the Melrose section of the Bronx.

2007 Lafontaine Ave is located in the East Tremont section of the Bronx. It is a 7-story, mid-rise elevator building that was built in 2007 .

This low-rise 5-story building, located in Harlem, has 34 apartments and is near by the local post office, library and Jackie Robinson Park.

Located in Harlem and built in 2005, this 6-story modern mid-rise elevator building has 25 studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom apartments.

286 West 147th Street is a multi-family building in the Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan. It is a 6-story, walk- up building.

The residential building will provide 87 new low-income housing units of which 26 will be for veterans and their families. .

Charming five story building along a tree lined street in Harlem. Heat, hot water and cooking gas included in your monthly rent.

A 6-story brick building in the Bronx with 42 apartments ranging in size from one to three bedrooms.
